attributes.action: Help people like me get comp for negligence from the NHS & this Goverment
attributes.additional_details:
Help me get compactions for negligence of wear the NHS in 1962 were I was only 6 months old, put a Hypodermic Needle in my belly wear it broke off inside me, I had a op in 1978 to get it out wear it was unable to get out, of witch its still there today & I was stitched up wrong & pulls all the time,
 my parents tried to sue but was told it will take 10 to 20 years & both had to pay or give up there jobs & my still end up in debt I'm now disabled in wheelchair with Rheumatoid Arthritis I want This Government to pay what is right i have been in pain 53 years & will have until i die,
